title: MarketWatch - How to Judge Cloud-Software Stocks As Valuations Plummet
description: I/O Fund CEO and Tech Analyst Beth Kindig talks with MarketWatch tech editor Jeremy C. Owens about the metrics that matter for cloud-software companies, and what else to watch for out of the tech sector in the upcoming earnings season.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
